Html:
Hello,

I'm currently trying to get myself into PvP and have been asking myself about what gear to use (I don't think it's simply use the PvP items from honor rewards and so), what stats to stack, how to gem/enchant...

Can Rawr answer some questions here ? I know it would depend of class/spec, but is there a proper way to set up the optimizer with a PvP goal (playing with resillience, survivability, etc.) ?

Thanks.


PS : I have a feral druid character.

For some models. Priest in particular has better support for PvP. Cat and Bear don't really, though. Basically it means giving a survivability value to resilience, which I may do at some point, but is low priority, since Rawr is primarily PvE focused.
